Welcome to the PODLITE project! Podcasts hold valuable insights, but getting to them quickly can be a challenge. This AI application helps solve that. PODLITE automatically processes episode transcripts using advanced speech-to-text and powerful language models to generate smart summaries, extract key highlights, and identify guests.
